players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm saddened by Diana's death. We should all share our thoughts to figure out who the mafioso is."
Charlie: "I'm also sad about Diana. Alice, what are your thoughts so far? Bob, any suspicions?"
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. Alice, we need to vote him out."
Bob: "Alice, trust me. I'm the detective and my investigation confirmed Charlie is mafia. Vote with me to eliminate him and win this for Diana."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We need to vote Alice out to win."
You: "I believe Bob is the detective and Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for Charlie to avenge Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

You: "Alice, trust me. I'm the detective and my investigation confirmed Charlie is mafia. Vote with me to eliminate him and win this for Diana."

Alice: "I believe Bob is the detective and Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for Charlie to avenge Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

Day 1 begins.

You: "I'm also sad about Diana. Alice, what are your thoughts so far? Bob, any suspicions?"
